phrases.phrase: I've had SUCH a busy day!

I went to the store today and there was such a sweet girl at the cash register, I told her all about what you're doing with your life and did you know she's going to college to be a doctor? Why couldn't you have been a doctor?

I found the best shoes the other day, I've already ordered two more pairs in different colors, they are so cute. And comfortable. I've only worn them for one day but I feel like I could wear them all week. I wanted to get more shoes from that brand, but you know how shoes are nowadays, there's no quality control or standard sizing.
I remember when you were three you used to love running around without shoes on, you were such a handful that your father...
See, you kept getting angry at me for making you do that and now it's turned out great, hasn't it?
You never come visit anymore, you can't be THAT busy.
Have you heard from your father?
I worry about you, out there on your own.
Are you doing anything exciting this weekend?
I saw the cutest little outfits in the store today, if only I had grandchildren to shop for....
I'm not getting any younger, you know. You'll miss me when I'm gone.

choices.choice: Hey, mom, I think I'm losing you....
Maybe I should come visit soon.
I thought you were busy today.
Uhoh, my battery's about to die!

details.detail: You just got home from work, all you want to do is eat and sleep.
details.followup: You didn't have time to do anything else, now you'll have to wake up early!
You tried to cook dinner while talking to your mom and burned yourself!

details.detail: Uhoh, your mom called in the morning--you need to get ready for work!
details.followup: You stayed on the phone too long, you're going to be late!

details.detail: You're supposed to go out with your friends soon and you're still in your pajamas!
details.followup: Looks like you'll be going out in sleepwear chic.

details.detail: You're about to go into the movie theater.
details.followup: You missed the movie! You can't another showing for a week!
